item.description:
FMSSF will have a booth at the Cranberry Harvest Celebration this weekend. If you haven't been before, come! It's really fun. Lots of good food, music, crafts, kids activities, helicopter rides, and more!

Cranberry Harvest Celebration

Oct. 8-9.
10 A.M. TO 4 P.M.
RAIN OR SHINE
Admission $5,  $3 for seniors, Children under 7 free

Our booth will highlight (what else?) the Myles Standish State Forest!

You'll be able to buy an authentic Friends of Myles Standish State Forest "Rediscover Nature" Tee-shirts in all sizes; custom-designed bluebird nesting boxes at Native Bird Support Group discount price; and Frank Werny's new book, Hike Plymouth!: Over 70 Great Walks among the Pines and Ponds of Plymouth, MA, and Surrounding Areas, reduced for FMSSF members! All proceeds benefit the Forest.

Bird boxes and Tee-shirts will be $2.00 off with a membership at the Celebration only! 

If you can help out by spending a few hours at the FMSSF booth, please sign up at Doodle or contact Sharl at friends@friendsmssf.com. We'd be very glad to have your help!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have a booth at Frogfoot Bog!

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Come to the Cranberry Harvest Celebration
